snippet: Tens of thousands of Packers fans are shareholders in the team, making them in some ways a proxy for fans across the nation and the conscience of the N.F.L.
abstract: Tens of thousands of Green Bay Packers fans are shareholders in the team, making them in some ways a proxy for fans across the nation and the conscience of the NFL; many are displeased with how the league and commissioner Roger Goodell have handled domestic abuse scandals.
lead_paragraph: Tens of thousands of Packers fans are shareholders in the team, making them in some ways a proxy for fans across the nation and the conscience of the N.F.L.

headline.seo: Green Bay Packers' Shareholder Fans Weigh In on N.F.L. Cases
headline.main: Where Fans Have Stake in Team, Owners Aren’t Silent About Goodell and Violence
headline.print_headline: Where Fans Have Stake in Team, Owners Aren’t Silent About Goodell and Violence
